title: OH OH...
content: Looking forward(in a way)to mid June as I'll be at the Annual Dinner/Presentation Evenings of EBBW VALE RFC on Friday 15th and BRYNMAWR RFC on Saturday 16th at both HQ's.Not sure if  my eyes and head will be functioning properly on the Sunday but I'll give it a go!All of the presentation images are usually at the start(ish)of the evening so that'll suit me just fine as to not have any excuses for the images being blurry,due to uuummmmmm
